response.overview: The Naked Neighbors invites us into the everyday lives of an everyday couple… they just happen to make homemade sex videos for a living! In collaboration with filmmakers Paulita Pappel and Le James, award-winning amateur porn creators and Lustery couple Kim & Paolo (aka MySweetApple) open the doors to their beautiful Spanish villa for an intimate and deeply authentic taste of their day-to-day world behind the sex scenes. From details about their most popular and controversial video to a full tour of where the magic happens (hint: it’s everywhere), insights about managing the pressures of their porn professions and advice for newbies in the industry, this documentary gets up close and personal with the Malaga-based megababes as you’ve never seen them before. And then, in a brand-new experience for them too, they allow someone else to film them having sex for the first time ever in a one-shot sex tape made exclusively for Lustery – you don’t want to miss this!
response.title: The Naked Neighbors
